info.title: Twilio SIP Domains API
info.description: Twilio is a cloud communications Infrastructure as a Service(IaaS) company based in San Francisco, California. Twilio allows software developers to programmatically make and receive phone calls and send and receive text messages using its web service APIs. Twilio's services are accessed over HTTP and are billed based on usage.

delete.description: Remove a CredentialListMapping from a domain

parameters.name: mediaTypeExtension
parameters.description: By default, Twilios REST API returns XML. You may obtain CSV, JSON or HTML by appending .csv, .json, or .html.n

get.description: Get the user lists mapped to this domain.

parameters.name: mediaTypeExtension

post.description: Map a CredentialList to the domain.

get.description: Return a specific IpAccessControlListMapping instance by Sid.

get.description: Return the IpAccessControlListMappings that are associated to this domain.

post.description: Map an IpAccessControlList to this domain.

delete.description: Delete a domain. If you have created subdomains of a domain, you will not be able to delete the domain until you first delete all subdomains of it.

post.description: Creates a new Domain and returns its instance resource. You must pick a unique domain name that ends in .sip.twilio.com.nAfter creating a Domain, you must map it to an authentication method before the domain is ready to receive traffic.n
